text: (playful music)

- [Narrator] You can automate
and enhance everyday processes
with AI without human interactions
or customer experiences feeling robotic.

To keep your edge in the
era of working smarter,

your organization needs
to decrease repetitive,
error-prone manual tasks

and time-wasting swivel
chair interactions.
With IBM Robotic Process Automation
infused with market-leading AI,

you can make that happen
by building smarter bots
that help you get more done
because IBM RPA adds real intelligence
to the low-code scripts you create
and resilience to your operations.
From scripts as simple as determining

which of the three Matt
Smith's on your team

accessed a dataset to
scouring that dataset

to find correlations
across thousands of values,

AI helps your bots work
better, smarter, and faster.
And they learn more every day,

which means you have more
time to focus on innovating,
developing, and delivering
and more peace of mind while doing it.
With AI-powered IBM RPA,

your bots become more
than scripts you rely on
to save you time and money.

They clear the path for
an intelligent way to work

so you and your team can
tackle the real smart stuff.
You can build a better work day today.
(upbeat music)
